# skipDescendents()

**Instance Method**

Causes the receiver to skip recursion into the most recently obtained subdirectory.

## Declaration

```swift
func skipDescendents()
```

## Skipping Subdirectories

- **skipDescendants()**: Causes the receiver to skip recursion into the most recently obtained subdirectory.
